column4: But if he has no firewall, those ports should not be blocked.
pretty sure there are no open ports to begin with regardless if there is no firewall gui installed... iptables is installed by default.
Of course iptables is installed, but unless there is a firewall implementing iptables to block ports nothing should be blocked.
ok sorry let me be more specific : iptables(default cli interface to netfilter) and netfilter(the actual firewall) are installed by default.
